      • runCombat

        public int runCombat​(Warrior fighter1,
                     Warrior fighter2,
                     java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                     JavaDrawingPanel w,
                     java.util.LinkedList<Army> armies)
        runCombat - runs combat between two fighters, regularly updating the screen to let the user know what is happening (hence all the graphical parameters)
        Parameters:
        fighter1 - - the first combatant
        fighter2 - - the second combatant
        g - - the Graphics2D object
        w - - the drawing panel window
        armies - - the array of armies in the fight
        Returns:
        - the loser of the fight
